title: Gift Bitcoin this holiday season with Crypto.com

With Bitcoin having recently hit its all-time high at USD 20K, BTC is the gift that keeps on giving and is a great choice for every wish list. Buy Bitcoin as a Christmas gift for your loved ones with Crypto.com and enjoy some perks along the way!
Buy Bitcoin With Crypto.com App

The Crypto.com App allows you to buy Bitcoin and 80+ cryptocurrencies at true cost with a credit/debit card or other handy payment methods like bank transfer. You can also deposit Bitcoin into Earn from the App to receive up to 6.5% p.a.
Looking for stocking stuffers? Buy Gift Cards from your favourite brands with up to 10% CRO cashback directly in the Crypto.com App. Books, apparel, electronics—you name it, we’ve got it.
Download the Crypto.com app and start to enjoy these benefits.
If you want to leverage deep liquidity, low fees, and best execution price for trading Bitcoin, then sign up for the Crypto.com Exchange
Securely Store Your Bitcoin

The Crypto.com DeFi Wallet is the ideal place to store your Bitcoin gifts securely. It’s a non-custodial wallet in which your private keys are encrypted locally on your device with Secure Enclave, and protected by Biometric and 2-Factor Authentication. Easily access your crypto with your 12-word recovery phrase and send your Bitcoin to other ERC-20 wallets with ease.

Don’t stop your Bitcoin Christmas just yet. A Very Crypto.com Christmas with Extra Offerings

Crypto.com is celebrating the holiday season with 14 days of giving to its users. From 18 December, they will be holding giveaways and lucky draws across the App, Exchange, Pay, and Community. Here are some highlights and be sure to mark it in your calendar :

From 18 to 20 December, 10 lucky winners will be selected daily to receive USD 100 worth of BTC each. USD 3,000 worth of Bitcoin will be giving away!
Exchange Daily Lucky Draw: 21-31 December 2020
Trade on the Crypto.com Exchange to enter the Daily Lucky Draw, where one lucky user will receive a prize of up to USD 250 worth of CRO each day. There’s a total of USD 2,750 to be won!

For one week starting from 25 December, you can earn points by completing tasks for the chance to win USD 25 of CRO. A total of 100 lucky winners will be selected, join their Main Telegram Community now.
